BDAY_BODY_CBB_000001:
Double Cashback Bonus Birthday Promotion

Program Terms

Sign up to earn 2% Cashback Bonus on up to $250 in purchases from the first day of the birthday promotion month for which you enroll (or the date on which you sign up, whichever is later) through the last day of that month. Purchases earning 2% Cashback Bonus are not included in determining your total annual purchases eligible to earn 1% Cashback Bonus. These purchases must post to your account by the last day of the month. Allow up to 5 weeks for this reward to be added to your Cashback Bonus account. See Cashback Bonus Program Terms and Conditions for further details about your reward program.

ACT020_BODY_CBB_000001:
5% Cashback Bonus Promotion

Earn 5% Cashback Bonus on up to $300 in purchases in May at:

  • Grocery Stores

Program Terms

Sign up to earn 5% Cashback Bonus on purchases made at grocery stores from 5/1/12 (or the date on which you sign up, whichever is later) through 5/31/12, subject to a cap of $300 in purchases. Grocery store purchases are those made at merchants classified as stand-alone grocery stores or supermarkets. These purchases must post to your account by 5/31/12. Grocery or food purchases made at convenience stores, gas stations, warehouse clubs, supercenters and discount stores are not eligible. If a purchase is coded for a category other than those listed above, it will not qualify. Purchases earning 5% Cashback Bonus will not count towards your total annual purchases to determine your tier level. This program is separate from the 5% quarterly program. Rewards are added to your Cashback Bonus account at the end of your billing period. See Cashback Bonus Program Terms and Conditions for further details about your reward program.

DD0025_CONFIRM_BODY_CBB_000001:
2% Cashback Bonus

You're Signed Up for 2% Cashback Bonus!

September 1- September 4, 2012

Any grocery store purchases

Sign up to earn 2% Cashback Bonus on purchases made at grocery stores from 9/1/12 (or the date on which you sign up, whichever is later) through 9/4/12. Grocery store purchases are those made at merchants classified as stand-alone grocery stores or supermarkets. If a purchase is coded for a category other than those listed above, it will not qualify. Grocery or food purchases made at convenience stores, gas stations, warehouse clubs, supercenters and discount stores are not eligible. Purchases earning 2% Cashback Bonus will not count towards your total annual purchases to determine your tier level. Rewards are added to your Cashback Bonus account within 2 billing periods. Only More, Open Road and Motiva Cardmembers are eligible to participate in this program. See Cashback Bonus Program Terms and Conditions for further details.

DD0037_BODY_CBB_000001:
2% Cashback Bonus

Program Terms

Sign up to earn 2% Cashback Bonus on up to $250 in purchases from August 15 or the date on which you enroll (whichever is later) through August 31, 2012. These purchases do not count towards the annual purchases eligible to earn 1% Cashback Bonus. These purchases must post to your account by the last day of the month. We are not responsible for merchant delays in processing transactions. Allow up to 2 billing cycles for this reward to be added to your Cashback Bonus account. See Cashback Bonus Program Terms and Conditions for further details about your rewards program.

!~signupStatusTextButton~!
